a:entry.a:title: The New LG LED W86L

Plus, the W86L has a tantalizingly thin width of only 1/3 of conventional wide LCD monitoâ€¦
a:entry.fullDescription: The Lord of Light Reigns the Display KingdomThe New LG LED W86LThe new LG LED LCD Monitor W86L series is perfect for your all entertainments purposes, especially High Definition gaming : exceptionally clean and vivid images with the Mega contrast ratio which is possible only with the LED LCD technology, Full HD resolution with 1920 x 1080 pixels, clear afterimage-free picture with ultra-fast response time. Plus, the W86L has a tantalizingly thin width of only 1/3 of conventional wide LCD monitors and saves energy by 42%, which are all possible only with LG LED LCD. Experience it!
